DOC.criteria: The patient must give his/her inform sign consent The patient must insure beneficiary health insurance plan The patient available 3 month follow The patient least one child The patient desire definitive tubal sterilization via ESSURE technique The legal delay 4 month request sterilization surgery respect Local contraception ( condom spermicide ) must use three month tubal sterilization The patient participate another study The patient exclusion period determine previous study The patient judicial protection , tutorship curatorship The patient refuse sign consent It impossible correctly inform patient The patient pregnant , parturient , breastfeed The patient diagnose pregnancy ( include pregnancy lose interruption 2nd 3rd trimester ) within 4 month ESSURE implant The patient contraindication treatment use study The patient use one follow type contraception : intrauterine device ; oestroprogestatif ( pill ) .
